publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2758 Bill Kidd: Employment Support Allowance and its Impact on Disabled People—That the Parliament expresses concern that the sanctions contained in the new Employment Support Allowance may work against the interests of disabled people and notes, in particular, the view of Leonard Cheshire Disability that "The additional threat of penalties will not result in more job offers for disabled people".
